p: Vartiainen et al. [ 105] prepared a food packaging film by incorporating imazalil into 2 mm-thick LDPE films. The molded plates containing 0.05â€“0.25% has a strong antimicrobial activity against A. niger. Imazalil can also highly inhibit A. niger growth with 30 mm inhibition zones. Cohen et al. [ 106] studied the activity of imazalil incorporated into HDPE film by using four different citrus varieties. They found that imazalil significantly reduces the degree of putrefaction in all varieties of citrus fruits.
